summary: An email from Assistant United States Attorney Maurene to arrange a pretrial interview for Ghislaine Maxwell with her attorneys, Chris Everdell and Mark Cohen, ahead of her bail hearing in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Copied on the email as one of two attorneys representing defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in her criminal case.

persons.name: Mark Cohen
persons.context: Copied on the email as one of two attorneys representing defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in her criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in case number 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), for whom a pretrial interview is being arranged ahead of her bail hearing.

persons.name: Maurene
persons.context: The sender of the email from the Southern District of New York, facilitating the arrangement of a pretrial interview for Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Everdell is listed as an attorney representing defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Cohen is listed as an attorney representing defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Both are attorneys representing the same client, Ghislaine Maxwell, in her criminal case.
Maurene, an AUSA, is corresponding with Everdell regarding legal arrangements for his client.
Maurene, an AUSA, is corresponding with Cohen regarding legal arrangements for his client.

events.title: Email arranging pretrial interview
events.description: Assistant United States Attorney Maurene sends an email to arrange a pretrial interview for Ghislaine Maxwell with her attorneys ahead of her bail hearing.

events.title: Upcoming bail hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell has a bail hearing scheduled for the week following July 6, 2020.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell is represented by attorneys Christian Everdell and Mark Cohen in criminal case 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
The U.S. Attorney's Office (via AUSA Maurene) is facilitating a pretrial interview for Maxwell ahead of her bail hearing.
The correspondence indicates active legal proceedings for Maxwell in July 2020 in the Southern District of New York.
